column3: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
column5: Enhance your knowledge with a master's in artificial intelligence (AI) at the University of Southampton. Our researchers draw on their own research to offer modules on state-of-the-art fields like computer vision, robotics and machine learning.You can choose among these to develop the specialist skills you'll need for further study or a career in application development.This AI master's will give you a solid grounding in traditional artificial intelligence, and you'll study emerging topics like:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
